Text:
Thanks for the upload.
The download consists of 2 .cue files and 2 .mp3 files. How can I burn the songs trackwise?
I mean, I want to burn the songs not as a big 1hr song but as 20 different tracks. Is there a way to do this?

Great upload btw. :)

Ive got a software that can split the big mp3 to different tracks. Ive downloaded it from http://www.medieval.it/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=28&Itemid=70

Have fun :)
